entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Leonard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
